mapper.select: select count(*) from ldbz_wishlist w join ldbz_item i on w.item_code = i.code where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into ldbz_wishlist ( id , created , creator , creator_name, item_code , user_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
